EmailTemplate.name: DF Session Attendee Cancellation HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: Session attendee cancellation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{event.Session_Organiser__r.Name}},
{{contact.First_Name__c}} {{contact.Last_Name__c}} has unregistered to your Dementia Friends Information Session {{event.Name}} on {{event.Event_Date_Time__c}}
You now have {{event.Number_Of_Attendee_Records__c}} registered attendees.
Kind Regards,
Dementia Friends
dementiafriends.org.uk
